channel.title: BULLS on ChiSports Data
channel.description: Recent content in BULLS on ChiSports Data

item.title: Looking for a reset button: How Jim Boylen changed the 2019 Bulls
item.description: Since taking over for Fred Hoiberg at the beginning of December, Jim Boylen has taken a ton of criticism for his approach as the new lead man for the Bulls, but rightfully so. His “play hard” mentality and push to be the best conditioned team in the league (defending push-up champs) hasn’t resonated with players of this era. Not only is this management style not fitting well, his philosophy as a coach doesn’t fit the mold of how the league has trended with a barrage of three point attempts coming per game.

item.title: Example
